_aboutDescription: Our purpose is to glorify God through thoughtful worship, evangelism, authentic fellowship, impactful social action, and the ongoing spiritual development of our members. Situated in an English-speaking nation, we are a multicultural church established by Brazilian immigrants, embracing people from every nation. We are committed to adhering to biblical principles, fostering inclusion and unity in love, so that together we may fulfill God's will.
_projectsDescription: This is a some projects who I do in this last year

_p1._description: Modern, responsive, fast website that meets customer needs.
_p1._details: Psychologist Renata, a specialist in cognitive behavioral therapy, needed a modern and functional website to improve her online presence and increase patient intake.

_p2._description: Order management system using the VueJS framework
_p2._details: This project simulates an ordering system, where the customer can choose the type of bread, meat and complements.

_p3._description: RestFull API using .NET, SQL Server, Entity Framework, Swager technologies
_p3._details: This project aims to provide an API for courses, containing data on modules, classes, students, instructors, grades, class tracking, etc.

_contactDescription:
Do you need help completing a project, meeting a demand or creating a tool that helps you in your daily life?
Contact me!
We will be happy to discuss your ideas and find the best solution for your needs.
